title: Pvp.net problems
body:
Twice in the past 3 days, my game disconnected from the PvP.net in the middle of a draft. The first time it resolved itself and I was able to pick and play the game, but the second time it didn't refresh in time and I ended up with a leaver-buster penalty.

Both times, the animations and music continued to play, but it didn't tell me what anyone was picking.

If it matters, both times I was picking last on the blue side.

Can anyone help with this problem? It has only happened twice and I've been able to play games in between.

UPDATE: I tried joining an ARAM game this time, but after I accepted the AFK check the timer ran out with 9 people, and it just stayed there for a minute. Then I was returned to the lobby, out of the queue.

I think it has something to do with the server...

replies.body:
It sounds like you're having an unstable connection during Champion Select.  There are some troubleshooting steps that can help to locate the origin of the connection issue and get you back in the game.  Check out our [Connection Troubleshooting ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to help get this fixed up!

I hope that helps!
